greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of Abelian groups of order 2n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: Multiplicative with a(2^k) = A000041(1+k), and for odd primes p, a(p^k) = A000041(k), where A000041(k) is the number of partitions of k. - _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 27 2018
xref: Bisection of A000688. Cf. also A101876 (bisection of this sequence).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 28 2005
